citations.narrative:
The licensee failed to notify USDA APHIS Animal Care that they had sold the pet store and is no longer conducting
regulated activity as of June 1st, 2025. Failure to notify the agency of changes that affect the operating status of a
licensee impedes the APHIS Officials' ability to carry out their duties. A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90
days and obtain a new license before any change in the name, address, substantial control or ownership of his business
or operation, locations, activities, and number of animals described in paragraph (b)(2) of this section. Correct by
10/10/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee failed to notify USDA APHIS Animal Care that they had sold the pet store and is no longer conducting 
regulated activity as of June 1st, 2025. Failure to notify the agency of changes that affect the operating status of a 
licensee impedes the APHIS Officials' ability to carry out their duties. A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 
days and obtain a new license before any change in the name, address, substantial control or ownership of his business 
or operation, locations, activities, and number of animals described in paragraph (b)(2) of this section. Correct by 
10/10/2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
